x_nuvo_diag_probes.description: World View in End User Application does not work in the Romania release.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: World View Not Loading
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation:
x_nuvo_eam.td_map_tile_provider Value should be pointing to tile provider's api URL (System Properties)
x_nuvo_eam_np_world_view_permitted Value should be set to true (Space Management)
or Check for punctuation marks (apostrophes) in Space records' Address fields
Location records' Description field containing /n /r charsets.
